thread.section_title: Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: WONDERFUL
thread.title_full: WONDERFUL - Review of Days Inn Hotel New York City-Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: moseleygirl
title: WONDERFUL
text: Just spent 5 nights there to visit NYC. This hotel is in a fantastic location, right next to a subway station. There is a duane reed at the ground level. Staff was sooo lovely and friendly. Checked in with Graciela who could not have been nicer. We are so grateful to have a must stay place to go whenever we visit NYC !! Thank you !!
